name: Gauntlet of IRE
description: A 35 part obstacle course that is deceptively simple and infuriatingly obvious in the most difficult way.
minimum_requirements: Mínimos: SO: Windows XP SP2+ Processador: SSE2 instruction set support Memória: 4 GB de RAM Placa de vídeo: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities Armazenamento: 30 MB de espaço disponível
